text: Carola Bott (born 9 July 1984) is a German female badminton player. In 2003, she won bronze medal at the European Junior Badminton Championships in girls' doubles event with Karin Schnaase. == Achievements == === European Junior Championships=== Girls' Doubles {|class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" !|Year !|Venue !|Partner !|Opponent !|Score !|Result |-style="background:#AABBCC" |align="center"|2003 |align="left"|Esbjerg, Denmark |align="left"| Karin Schnaase |align="left"| Nina Vislova Valeria Sorokina |align="left"|5–11, 2–15 |style="text-align:left; background:white"|Bronze Bronze |} === BWF International Challenge/Series === Women's singles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !
